analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.lt.teaching.nlp4web.ml.postagger.PosTaggerAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: FeatureExtractionFile
configurationParameter.description: if a feature extraction/context extractor filename is given the xml file is parsed and the features are used, otherwise it will not be used

configurationParameter.name: classifierFactoryClassName
configurationParameter.description: provides the full name of the SequenceClassifierFactory class to be used.

configurationParameter.name: dataWriterFactoryClassName
configurationParameter.description: provides the full name of the SequenceDataWriterFactory class to be used.

configurationParameter.name: isTraining
configurationParameter.description: determines whether this annotator is writing training data or using a classifier to annotate. Normally inferred automatically based on whether or not a DataWriterFactory class has been set.
